sponsoredCallERC2771((uint256,address,by.details: Payment is handled with off-chain accounting using Gelato's 1Balance systemThe userNonce abstraction does not support multiple calls (call concurrency)Apps that need concurrent user calls will need to implement multi-callingon their end via encoding into _call.data.

params._call: Relay call data packed into CallWithERC2771 struct
params._correlationId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato
